mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.amount AS "amount", a.transfer_type AS "transferType", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.apply_status AS "applyStatus", a.auditor AS "auditor", a.reject_reason AS "rejectReason", a.extend1 AS "extend1", a.extend2 AS "extend2", a.extend3 AS "extend3"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transfer_apply( id, merchant_id, order_id, amount, transfer_type, create_time, update_time, apply_status, auditor, reject_reason, extend1, extend2, extend3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantId}, #{orderId}, #{amount}, #{transferType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{applyStatus}, #{auditor}, #{rejectReason}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{extend3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE transfer_apply SET merchant_id = #{merchantId}, order_id = #{orderId}, amount = #{amount}, transfer_type = #{transferType}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, apply_status = #{applyStatus}, auditor = #{auditor}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason}, extend1 = #{extend1}, extend2 = #{extend2}, extend3 = #{extend3} WHERE id = #{id}
